origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinancialAPI.get_reports', 'description': 'This function retrieves financial reports based on the type of report, company name, and specific quarter.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'reportType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial report, e.g., asset_quality, income_statement.'}, {'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company.'}, {'name': 'quarter', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The specific quarter for the report, e.g., Q3 2023.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'The financial report data.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinancialAPI.get_reports, 它的参数输入如下: 'reportType'是'asset_quality', 'company'是'China CITIC Bank', 'quarter'是'Q3 2023'.
